name: Loop Dude
description:
Around and around Loop Dude goes...

Where he'll stop, no-one knows!

Help Loop Dude on his journey to the Center of the World, and solve tricky puzzles along the way!

Features:

  • 4 Levels with 8 rooms each!
  • Kaizo-inspired controls!
  • Original 8-bit soundtrack!

--Controls--

Left & Right arrow keys make Loop Dude run left and right respectively.

Up & Down arrow keys make Loop Dude aim his throw straight up or down.

X key holds items such as boxes or keys. Releasing the X key will throw the item in whatever direction Loop Dude is aiming.

C key makes Loop Dude Jump.

---

This is my submission for Black and White Jam #8 with the theme of "Loop." I tried to incorporate the theme by having screens loop from the top to the bottom as well as connecting the 8th room back to the 1st room on each layer. I was somewhat heavily inspired by the Kaizo genre of platformers, and am pretty satisfied with how my item physics turned out. The puzzles don't have much meat behind them, and the physics are still kind of janky, but I'm still satisfied with it for my first ever game jam, especially considering I did this all solo and from the ground up!

(Current version: 1.1)
